info.title: Slack Do Not Disturb API
info.description: The API for management Slack Do Not Disturbs

get.summary: Ends the current user's Do Not Disturb session immediately.
get.description: Ends the current user's Do Not Disturb session immediately.

get.summary: Ends the current user's snooze mode immediately.
get.description: Ends the current user's snooze mode immediately.

get.summary: Retrieves a user's current Do Not Disturb status.
get.description: Retrieves a user's current Do Not Disturb status.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: User to fetch status for (defaults to current user)

get.summary: Turns on Do Not Disturb mode for the current user, or changes its duration.
get.description: Turns on Do Not Disturb mode for the current user, or changes its duration.

parameters.name: num_minutes
parameters.description: Number of minutes, from now, to snooze until.

get.summary: Retrieves the Do Not Disturb status for users on a team.
get.description: Retrieves the Do Not Disturb status for users on a team.

parameters.name: users
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of users to fetch Do Not Disturb status for
